{/* Main Header Image */}
{/* Placeholder for the main image */}

Training Tips

Here you can find useful tips for training your pet.

{/* Section 1 */}

1. Start Early, Stay Consistent

Begin training as soon as you bring your pet home. Consistency is key! Stick to a regular routine and use the same commands and signals for each behavior.

{/* Placeholder for an image */}
{/* Section 2 */}

2. Use Positive Reinforcement

Reward good behavior with treats, praise, or toys. Positive reinforcement encourages your pet to repeat desired behaviors.

{/* Section 3 */}

3. Keep Training Sessions Short

Limit training sessions to 5-10 minutes at a time to keep your pet engaged and prevent frustration.

{/* Section 4 */}

4. Be Patient and Persistent

Training takes time, and each pet learns at their own pace. Stay patient and donâ€™t get discouraged if progress is slow.

{/* Add more sections as needed */}
); };
